response.overview: In 2025, Jan Elhøj returns to the stage with his brand new comedy show, Ser man det. With his wry wit and sharp observations, he will share his thoughts on both today's and yesterday's Denmark.  The show asks the questions: Who are we? Where do we want to go? And who do we think we are?  With his unique attention to detail, Jan invites the audience on a journey through the familiar - with a completely new and hilarious angle.  Jan Elhøj steps away from the quirky characters to focus on the good story for a laugh. The language flowers are carefully harvested and ready to be shared from the stage in 2025, where Jan promises pure comedy - the Jan way.
response.title: Jan Elhøj: Ser man det
